channel.title: Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Name of the work 2
item.description: When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarksgrove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane.

item.title: Name of the work 3
item.description: Fifth abundantly made Give sixth hath. Cattle creature i be don’t them.

item.title: Item without image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: About
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: markdown语法
item.description: 这个博文说明怎么使用markdown语法。 以下Copy Typora提供的markdown参考。 Overview Markdown is created by Daring Fireball, the original guideline is here. Its syntax, however, varies between different parsers or editors. Typora is

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: 这是一篇关于hugo blog开始正常显示的测试文。 <!--more-->对文章进行摘要不起作用，summary选项也不行。Rmd

item.title: Name of the work 1
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description:
center, right, left

## default
![img](/path/to/img.gif "img")

{{% center %}}
## center
![img](/path/to/img.gif "img")
{{% /center %}}

{{% right %}}
## right
![img](/path/to/img.gif "img")
{{% /right %}}

{{% left %}}
## left
![img](/path/to/img.gif "img")
{{% /left %}}

item.title: Welcome to Tranquilpeak 0.4.3-BETA
item.description: Tranquilpeak is a gorgeous responsive theme for Hugo blog framework. It has many features and integrated services to improve user experience.

item.title: JS Flowchart Diagrams
item.description:
Usage

st=>start: Start|past:>http://www.google.com[blank]
e=>end: End:>http://www.google.com
op1=>operation: My Operation|past
op2=>operation: Stuff|current
sub1=>subroutine: My Subroutine|invalid
cond=>condition: Yes
or No?|approved:>http://www.google.com
c2=>condition: Good idea|rejected
io=>inputoutput: catch something...|request

st->op1(right)->cond
cond(yes, right)->c2
cond(no)->sub1(left)->op1
c2(yes)->io->e
c2(no)->op2->e

item.title: JS Sequence Diagrams
item.description:
Usage

Andrew->China: Says Hello
Note right of China: China thinks\nabout it
China-->Andrew: How are you?
Andrew->>China: I am good thanks!

item.title: Tags plugins showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how tag plugins are displayed. See docs for more info.

item.title: Video integrations showcase
item.description: Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.

item.title: Syntax Highlighting
item.description:
function helloWorld () {
  alert("Hello, World!")
}
